org.webcurator.ui.util
Class OverrideGetter

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.ui.util.OverrideGetter

public class OverrideGetter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for getting an Overridable object from the session or Http request depending on the type.

Author:
nwaight
